EmailTemplate.name: Exam pass notification - two exams
EmailTemplate.subject: You passed your exams!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You passed both the {!Education_History__c.Exam_Type__c} and [Exam type 2] exams you took on {!Education_History__c.Scheduled_Date__c}!
You now meet all requirements for a {!Education_History__c.License_Type__c} license.
We'll send you a separate email with your license number and information on how to print your license.
Questions? Need help? {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov APP014
